title: Abraham Fatnowna
text:
Abraham "Butch" Fatnowna (born 19 April 1974) is an Australian former <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played for <a href="Brisbane%20Broncos">Brisbane Broncos</a>, <a href="Workington%20Town">Workington Town</a>, and <a href="Hunslet%20R.L.F.C.">Hunslet Hawks</a>.
Fatnowna joined <a href="Workington">Workington</a> in July 1996 during the inaugural <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a> season. A year later, he joined <a href="London">London</a>.
